parameters.definition: Hours of oven time required for a batch of bagels
Hours of pastry chef time required for a batch of bagels
Hours of oven time required for a batch of croissants
Hours of pastry chef time required for a batch of croissants
Total daily available pastry chef hours

description: A bakery bakes bagels and croissants. A batch of bagels can be made using \param{BagelOvenTime} hours of oven time and \param{BagelChefTime} hours of pastry chef time. A batch of croissants is more complicated, so while they take \param{CroissantOvenTime} hours of oven time, they take \param{CroissantChefTime} hours of pastry chef time. In a day, the bakery has at most \param{TotalOvenHours} hours available for the oven and \param{TotalChefHours} pastry chef hours available. Using all the available capacity, what is the maximum profit the bakery can generate assuming the profit per batch is \param{ProfitBagel} and \param{ProfitCroissant} respectively for a batch of bagels and a batch of croissants.
